school.description: Student's school (GP - Gabriel Pereira or MS - Mousinho da Silveira)

sex.description: Student's sex (F - female or M - male)

address.description: Student's home address type (U - urban or R - rural)

famsize.description: Family size (LE3 - less or equal to 3 or GT3 - greater than 3)

Pstatus.description: Parent's cohabitation status (T - living together or A - apart)

Medu.description: Mother's education (0 - none, 1 - primary education (4th grade), 2 – 5th to 9th grade, 3 – secondary education or 4 – higher education)

Fedu.description: Father's education (0 - none, 1 - primary education (4th grade), 2 – 5th to 9th grade, 3 – secondary education or 4 – higher education)

Mjob.description: Mother's job (teacher, health care related, civil services, at home or other)

Fjob.description: Father's job (teacher, health care related, civil services, at home or other)

reason.description: Reason to choose this school (close to home, school reputation, course preference or other)

traveltime.description: Home to school travel time (1 - <15 min., 2 - 15 to 30 min., 3 - 30 min. to 1 hour, or 4 - >1 hour)

studytime.description: Weekly study time (1 - <2 hours, 2 - 2 to 5 hours, 3 - 5 to 10 hours, or 4 - >10 hours)

failures.description: Number of past class failures (n if 1<=n<3, else 4)

value_dict.no: Does not receive extra educational support
Does not receive family educational support

paid.description: Extra paid classes within the course subject (Math or Portuguese) (yes or no)

value_dict.no: Does not have extra paid classes
Does not participate in extra-curricular activities

higher.description: Wants to take higher education (yes or no)

value_dict.no: Does not want to take higher education

internet.description: Internet access at home (yes or no)

value_dict.no: Does not have internet access at home

romantic.description: With a romantic relationship (yes or no)

famrel.description: Quality of family relationships (from 1 - very bad to 5 - excellent)

freetime.description: Free time after school (from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

goout.description: Going out with friends (from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

Dalc.description: Workday alcohol consumption (from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

Walc.description: Weekend alcohol consumption (from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

health.description: Current health status (from 1 - very bad to 5 - very good)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in student performance prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the student lifestyle and study habits, please predict the final grade (G3) of the student.
prompt.answer_prompt: The final grade (G3) is predicted to be {G3}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in student performance prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the student lifestyle and study habits, please predict the second period grade (G2) of the student.
prompt.answer_prompt: The second period grade (G2) is predicted to be {G2}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in student performance prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the student lifestyle and study habits, please predict the first period grade (G1) of the student.
prompt.answer_prompt: The first period grade (G1) is predicted to be {G1}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in student health prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the student lifestyle and study habits, please predict the health status of the student.
prompt.answer_prompt: The health status is predicted to be {health}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in student attendance prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the student lifestyle and study habits, please predict the number of absences of the student.
prompt.answer_prompt: The number of absences is predicted to be {absences}.
